projects.name: Hotel Management System
projects.description: An interface which will contain a login button and the whole interface is designed by Java core. All DATA Store in MySQL databases. After login Dashboard contains all information of Hotel Management and ADMIN respectively. It contains add Employee, Driver information, room available, Reception.... so many.

projects.name: Photo Web
projects.description: An user interactive website which describes the different images with different icon images and images visible at the time during scrolling the web page and with specific rotation.

projects.name: NeoPixel Control
projects.description: Users are able to control the NeoPixel LED light using a WebPage acting as a client.

experiences.role_name: Embedded Full Stack IOT Analyst Trainee
experiences.description: Created a backend + frontend internal tool to see all the Embedded Full Stack IOT related to the Hardware and software design. Trainee have to learn how things are communicated to each other. and this microcontroller are used such as ESP32, and ESP 8266. During this Trainee I am learning and Exploring many things Arduino, Free RTOS, ESP IDF, GUI, Cloud, git Linux, Python, microphython, and Developing many projects that are already uploaded on GitHub such as led blinking, motion detector project, ChatRoom, WiFi and Hotspot station, DHT, NeoPixel and many more.
